variable.tooltip:
Up to 127, this sets the speed step above which the intensity of BEMF control will be reduced
to zero. Values over 127 cause the BEMF to decrease as a percentage (up to 50%).
variable.label: BEMF Cutout (0-127 or 128-255)

variable.tooltip:
Sets the time period that is allowed to elapse between receipts of a valid packet
addressed to the decoder before a throttle shutdown occurs. Enter zero to disable.
variable.label: Packet Time Out Value (0-255)

variable.tooltip:
Defines the type of power source the decoder should
switch to whenever a DCC signal is not present.
(Tip: Alternate Power Source must be enabled)
variable.label: Power Source Conversion Type

variable.tooltip:
Enter the Lock ID Code to unlock access to the decoder CVs.
(Tip: Establish the unlock code with CV Lock ID Code)
variable.label: CV Unlock Register (0-7)

variable.tooltip: Sets the unlock code that must be entered into the CV Unlock Register in order to access the decoder CVs
variable.label: CV Lock ID Code (0-7)

variable.tooltip: Select a manufacturers speed curve, or use a curve you define yourself
variable.label: Speed Table Selection

variable.tooltip: Enable locking of CVs when decoder is used in a multi-decoder installation
variable.label: CV Lock Enable

variable.tooltip: Alters the timing of the effect so that it's 180 degrees out of phase with the other effects
variable.label: Headlight F0(f) Phase Selection

variable.tooltip: Causes the lighting effect to become active only when the horn has been sounded
variable.label: Headlight F0(f) Grade Crossing Logic

variable.tooltip: Provides special compensation for lighting effect contrast when using LEDs
variable.label: Headlight F0(f) Light Type

variable.tooltip: Alters the timing of the effect so that it's 180 degrees out of phase with the other effects
variable.label: Backup Light F0(r) Phase Selection

variable.item: Backup Light F0(r) Grade Crossing Logic
variable.tooltip: Causes the lighting effect to become active only when the horn has been sounded
variable.label: Backup Light F0(r) Grade Crossing Logic

variable.tooltip: Provides special compensation for lighting effect contrast when using LEDs
variable.label: Backup Light F0(r) Light Type

variable.tooltip: Alters the timing of the effect so that it's 180 degrees out of phase with the other effects
variable.label: FX3 Phase Selection

variable.tooltip: Causes the lighting effect to become active only when the horn has been sounded
variable.label: FX3 Grade Crossing Logic

variable.tooltip: Provides special compensation for lighting effect contrast when using LEDs
variable.label: FX3 Light Type

variable.tooltip: Alters the timing of the effect so that it's 180 degrees out of phase with the other effects
variable.label: FX4 Phase Selection

variable.tooltip: Causes the lighting effect to become active only when the horn has been sounded
variable.label: FX4 Grade Crossing Logic

variable.tooltip: Provides special compensation for lighting effect contrast when using LEDs
variable.label: FX4 Light Type

variable.tooltip: Alters the timing of the effect so that it's 180 degrees out of phase with the other effects
variable.label: FX5 Phase Selection

variable.tooltip: Causes the lighting effect to become active only when the horn has been sounded
variable.label: FX5 Grade Crossing Logic

variable.tooltip: Provides special compensation for lighting effect contrast when using LEDs
variable.label: FX5 Light Type

variable.tooltip: Alters the timing of the effect so that it's 180 degrees out of phase with the other effects
variable.label: FX6 Phase Selection

variable.tooltip: Causes the lighting effect to become active only when the horn has been sounded
variable.label: FX6 Grade Crossing Logic

variable.tooltip: Provides special compensation for lighting effect contrast when using LEDs
variable.label: FX6 Light Type

variable.tooltip: Check to enable F0(f) function output in Forward direction
variable.label: Headlight F0(f) Forward Directional Control

variable.item: Backup Light F0(r) Forward Directional Control
variable.tooltip: Check to enable F0(r) function output in Forward direction
variable.label: Backup Light F0(r) Forward Directional Control

variable.tooltip: Check to enable FX3 function output in Forward direction
variable.label: FX3 Forward Directional Control

variable.tooltip: Check to enable FX4 function output in Forward direction
variable.label: FX4 Forward Directional Control

variable.tooltip: Check to enable FX5 function output in Forward direction
variable.label: FX5 Forward Directional Control

variable.tooltip: Check to enable FX6 function output in Forward direction
variable.label: FX6 Forward Directional Control

variable.tooltip: Check to enable F0(f) function output in Reverse direction
variable.label: Headlight F0(f) Reverse Directional Control

variable.item: Backup Light F0(r) Reverse Directional Control
variable.tooltip: Check to enable F0(r) function output in Reverse direction
variable.label: Backup Light F0(r) Reverse Directional Control

variable.tooltip: Check to enable FX3 function output in Reverse direction
variable.label: FX3 Reverse Directional Control

variable.tooltip: Check to enable FX4 function output in Reverse direction
variable.label: FX4 Reverse Directional Control

variable.tooltip: Check to enable FX5 function output in Reverse direction
variable.label: FX5 Reverse Directional Control

variable.tooltip: Check to enable FX6 function output in Reverse direction
variable.label: FX6 Reverse Directional Control

variable.tooltip: Sets the overall flash rate of the Hyperlight effects, 0 is fast, 15 is slow
variable.label: Hyperlight Flash Rate (0-15)

variable.tooltip: Sets the time (in seconds) an effect will stay on after the horn button is released
variable.label: Grade Crossing Hold Time (0-15)

variable.tooltip: Adjust the brightness level of any output set to the on/off brightness 1 effect
variable.label: Brightness 1 Level (0-255)

variable.tooltip: Adjust the brightness level of any output set to the on/off brightness 2 effect
variable.label: Brightness 2 Level (0-255)

variable.tooltip: Adjust the brightness level of the on/off dimmable headlight effect
variable.label: Dimmer Level (0-255)

variable.tooltip:
When loco has stopped and all functions are turned off, sound effects will turn
off automatically after timeout period has elapsed. Set to zero to disable.
variable.label: Quiet Mode Timeout Period

variable.tooltip:
Adjust the motor response following a momentary power glitch
0 or 128 = Disabled
1-127 = Absolute Limiting (will return to this speed step)
129-255 = Proportional Limiting (a percentage of set speed)
variable.label: Motor Recovery Speed (0-255)

variable.tooltip: The selected bell to ring during the crossing-timer countdown when Grade-Crossing Logic is activated
variable.label: Grade-Crossing Bell Enable

variable.tooltip: Determine the coupler release sound effect activated by the coupler function
variable.label: Coupler Select

variable.tooltip: Determine the on/off polarity of the coupler release sound effect activated by the coupler function

enumChoice.choice: Coupler release activated when function is turned on
Coupler release activated when function is turned off

variable.label: Coupler Release Function Polarity

variable.tooltip: Sets the overall volume of all sound channels
variable.label: Master Volume Control

variable.tooltip: Sets the volume of the bell
variable.label: Bell Volume

variable.tooltip: Sets the volume of the couplers coupling
variable.label: Coupler Volume

variable.tooltip: Sets the volume of the brakes squealing
variable.label: Independent Brake Apply Volume

variable.tooltip: Sets the volume of the brakes releasing
variable.label: Independent Brake Release Volume

variable.tooltip: Sets the volume of the emergency brake application
variable.label: E-Brake App Volume

variable.tooltip: Sets the volume of the glad hand release
variable.label: Glad Hand Release Volume

variable.tooltip: Not included in Econami software releases prior to version 1.3
variable.label: All Aboard!/Coach Doors Volume

variable.tooltip: Specifies the throttle speed step where the automatic bell will first turn on
variable.label: Auto-Bell On Set Point

variable.tooltip: Set the duration in seconds that elapses from the time the bell sound effect is automatically turned on to the time it is turned off
variable.label: Auto-Bell On Time

variable.tooltip: Not included in Econami software releases prior to version 1.3
variable.label: Max Coach Door Count

variable.tooltip: Specifies the negative rate of throttle change needed to activate the automatic brake squeal
variable.label: Brake Squeal Sensitivity

variable.tooltip: Enables the Automatic Bell in Analog Mode
variable.label: Automatic Bell Enable (Analog Mode)

variable.tooltip: Enables the Automatic Brake Squeal in Analog Mode
variable.label: Automatic Brake Squeal Enable (Analog Mode)

variable.tooltip: Enables the Automatic Bell in Digital Mode
variable.label: Automatic Bell Enable

variable.tooltip: Enables the Automatic Brake Squeal in Digital Mode
variable.label: Automatic Brake Squeal Enable

variable.tooltip: Specifies a gain factor for the proportional part of the PID motor control equation
variable.label: Motor Kp Coefficient (0-255)

variable.tooltip: Specifies a gain factor for the integral part of the PID motor control equation
variable.label: Motor Ki Coefficient (0-255)

variable.tooltip: Specifies the gain value that is applied to the PID motor equation at low speeds to compensate for irregularities that occur during low-speed operation
variable.label: Low-Speed Compensation (0-255)

variable.tooltip: Specifies the percentage of back-EMF error (n/255) that is fed back from the control loop
variable.label: BEMF Feedback Intensity (0-255)

variable.tooltip: Specifies the time period in mS (milliseconds) between measurements
variable.label: Motor Control BEMF Sample Period (0-31)

variable.tooltip: Specifies a gain factor for the derivative part of the PID motor control equation
variable.label: Motor Control Sample Aperture Time (0-15)

variable.tooltip: Sets the back-EMF reference voltage by 0.1 volt increments, A value of 0 indicates that track voltage is used
variable.label: BEMF Reference Voltage (0-255)

variable.tooltip:
Determines the speed step at which voltage is first applied to the motor output to put the locomotive into motion.
Not included in Econami software releases prior to version 1.3
variable.label: Motor Speed Step Deadband (0-127)

variable.tooltip: Enable back-EMF motor control
variable.label: Back-EMF Enable

variable.tooltip: Direction commands will bring the motor to a full stop for a duration of 500ms before the decoder changes locomotive direction
variable.label: Auto-Stop Enable

variable.tooltip:
Determines the starting voltage level applied to the motor in analog mode;
The motor start voltage is calculated as a fraction of the available supply voltage.
Econami: Starting Voltage = Supply Voltage × CV 218 ÷ 255
Tsunami2: Starting Voltage = (CV 218 ÷ 10) + 6V
variable.label: Analog Mode Motor Start Voltage (0-255)

variable.tooltip: Selects one of six equalizer presets or selects a user adjustable profile
variable.label: Equalizer Control

variable.tooltip: 0 = -12dB (Cut) : 128 = 0dB (Flat) : 255 = +12dB (Boost)
variable.label: 62 Hz Cut/Boost

variable.tooltip: 0 = -12dB (Cut) : 128 = 0dB (Flat) : 255 = +12dB (Boost)
variable.label: 125 Hz Cut/Boost

variable.tooltip: 0 = -12dB (Cut) : 128 = 0dB (Flat) : 255 = +12dB (Boost)
variable.label: 250 Hz Cut/Boost

variable.tooltip: 0 = -12dB (Cut) : 128 = 0dB (Flat) : 255 = +12dB (Boost)
variable.label: 500 Hz Cut/Boost

variable.tooltip: 0 = -12dB (Cut) : 128 = 0dB (Flat) : 255 = +12dB (Boost)
variable.label: 1K Hz Cut/Boost

variable.tooltip: 0 = -12dB (Cut) : 128 = 0dB (Flat) : 255 = +12dB (Boost)
variable.label: 2K Hz Cut/Boost

variable.tooltip: 0 = -12dB (Cut) : 128 = 0dB (Flat) : 255 = +12dB (Boost)
variable.label: 4K Hz Cut/Boost
